description:
Stephan`s Zebstrika was revealed at the registration for the Don Battle Tournament in Raimon Town. Stephan was riding it when he met Ash and his friends. Stephan`s Blitzle evolved into Stephan`s Zebstrika as Stephan confirmed to Ash that it had evolved during the time between BW41 and their last meeting in BW31.
In the first round of the Don George Tournament, Stephan`s Zebstrika was matched up against Bianca`s Minccino. Bianca`s Minccino used Tickle to be a battle distraction but Stephan`s Zebstrika was able to compose itself and defeat it with a strong Stomp. Stephan`s Zebstrika`s win advanced Stephan into the second round of the tournament.
name: Zebraika (Kenyan)
